main event: Multiple sightings of an Unidentified Aerial Object (UAO) at Kirtland Air Force Base, New Mexico on 7th and 16-17th February 1950.
interesting points: Dr. LINCOLN LAJOIE reported an unidentified object at Kirtland Air Force Base
The object was described as reddish-green in color, pear-shaped with a trail, twice the size of the evening star, and with no apparent means of support.
Witnesses observed bright flashes of light and sudden disappearances of the UAO.
The UAO was observed by multiple credible witnesses, including military personnel and special agents.
The sightings lasted for 2-3 minutes and occurred two times on different dates.
location: Kirtland Air Force Base, New Mexico
witnesses: Dr. LINCOLN LAJOIE, Capt. A. Abernathy, Special Agent hubert R. Jenkins, Captain Armstead, and other military personnel
